The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office’s trademark application process How to accurately identify and classify goods and services in your trademark application Why trademark searches are important and the different types of trademark searches available Requirements for submitting materials related to your trademark application
You can keep track of your attorney consultation using the tools found in your personalized My Account page or contacting me directly using the information below. Remember, you can schedule an unlimited number of 30 minute attorney consultations regarding new legal matters.
You may contact me directly at any time with questions about your trademark application.
